body.name: Bathroom Dispenser for Menstrual Care Disposal - Bag Dispenser and Refill Boxes - for Tampons, Pads, Other Disposable Hygiene Products (Satin Chrome)
features: 🏬 Versatile Sanitary Solution: Equip restrooms in diverse locations, from businesses to homes, with this commercial-grade dispenser and 100 Scensibles disposal bags. Ideal for ensuring hygienic and discreet disposal of tampons, sanitary napkins, and pantiliners in hotels, rental properties, offices, gyms, yoga studios, RVs, boats, and gender-neutral facilities.

💼 Compact and Robust: Constructed from durable ABS plastic, the dispenser (3.75” x 5.25” x 1”) boasts a quick snap-open front for convenient refilling. It mounts effortlessly onto restroom partitions or walls with the provided double-sided adhesive tape or screws.

🌿 Hygienic, Discreet, and Sustainable: The included Scensibles bags (9.75” x 3.5”x 2” gusset) are made with 20% recycled plastic, providing a sustainable and efficient disposal solution. The contemporary gray-on-pink pattern effectively obscures contents, while the easy tie handle closure secures waste. By choosing Scensibles, you're not only ensuring cleanliness and privacy but also actively helping prevent blockages in toilets and sewer lines from improperly disposed of hygiene products.

🌸 Odor-Inhibiting Formula: Each Scensibles bag is embedded with a light fragrance and proprietary additives designed to combat and inhibit unpleasant odors. They contribute to an enhanced, fresh bathroom experience for all users.

🚱 Plumbing Protection: Encourage responsible disposal with Scensibles. Discouraging the flushing of tampons, sanitary pads, and other hygiene products, they provide a critical safeguard for septic systems, toilets, and sewer lines against expensive blockages. Protect your place of business or rental property by ensuring employees or guests do not contribute to costly plumbing issues.
body.description: Introducing the Scensibles Commercial-Grade Sanitary Bag Dispenser: an innovative solution for hygienic and discreet disposal of menstrual care products. This robust system, including 100 Scensibles disposal bags, makes it an ideal solution for businesses, rental properties, offices, gyms, yoga studios, RVs, boats, homes, and even gender-neutral restrooms.Constructed from high-quality ABS plastic, the compact dispenser features a snap-open front for hassle-free refilling. It's designed for easy installation on restroom partitions or walls, adding a professional touch to any restroom setup while ensuring compliance with the universal "Do Not Flush" guidelines.The Scensibles bags offer a dignified disposal method. With a contemporary grey-on-pink pattern that discreetly obscures contents and an easy-tie handle closure, these bags promote both cleanliness and user privacy. What's more, their proprietary odor-inhibiting formula ensures a fresh and pleasant restroom experience for all users.But the benefits go beyond hygiene and discretion. By discouraging the flushing of tampons, sanitary pads, and other hygiene products, the Scensibles system serves as a critical safeguard for your plumbing. Protect your business or rental property from costly repairs and maintenance by ensuring that employees or guests practice responsible disposal habits.Experience the Scensibles difference today. Invest in a solution that combines practicality, quality, and respect for your restroom environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprise... It's for guys, too!
reviews.reviewText: As all the other reviewers have said, this product works fine for the ladies and their tampons or sanitary napkins. However I am a guy, and I use this product, too. There is another use that has not been mentioned. Anyone who likes to be clean - or has to be clean to avoid irritating hemorrhoids - after doing number two will use a Wet One or a baby wipe after using the toilet paper. These wipes do not dissolve like toilet paper. They can and do accumulate and clog the plumbing. This has been a problem at work to the point that the building manager has posted signs in the Men's Rooms not to flush wet wipes or paper towels down the toilet. So at work I keep a box of scensible refills. Before going to the Men's Room I pull out a pink bag, put a couple of clean wet wipes inside. When finished with my business I put the pink bag (with the used wet wipes inside) into the trash can. At home I have a dispenser in the guest bathrooms and the master bathroom. I personally use the pink bags at home in the same way as at work so my toilets don't clog. Okay, I have bared my soul and that was all somewhat gross, so I apologize. But this is another perfectly legitimate - if off-label - use for these pink bags. They're great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Product, Serves Multiple Purposes and Does Not Look Intrusive
reviews.reviewText: We have a Guest Rental property and we have a Septic System, so no foreign products in the sewer system. I didn't want to instruct guests to not dispose of feminine products elsewhere without providing them with an option for disposal. Plus, placing items directly in the garbage can (albeit closeable), is not pleasant for the guest or for me cleaning up. This gem is nicely size, installs in minutes and is a simple reminder to put non flushable items in this cute little bag before placing it in the trash. Highly recommend and glad we purchased this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for at home
reviews.reviewText: If you have a septic system I highly recommend this. No one likes to put used sanity products into the garbage for all to see. Or even using half a roll of toilet paper to hide it. These little bags are great and the dispenser is very convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The name says it all, scensible!
reviews.reviewText: The best for work bathrooms. Love the instructions, the scent of the bags and how easy and convenient it is for the user. Removes any and all excuses for the end user. This is a must have for any business! The name says it all, sensible!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars YES good green product
reviews.reviewText: love the concept easy to installhopefully it will help in our restrooms

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am glad I made the purchase.
reviews.reviewText: So I got everything and I was very much pleased. The bags aren't as small as they look. So if you're are worrying if they will work, you don't have to. I haven't tried to install the holder so I can't speak to that. I would recommend all ladies to purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Every AirBnB should have one.
reviews.reviewText: Plainly stated, if you run an AirBnB rental, place one of these in every bathroom.If you do, you'll never be certain just how many plumbing repairs you'll have saved yourself from. But, I assure you, they'll be more than one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my RV. I know what can and can not go in the tank, but I can't always count on friends of mine or my kids to know or listen to the lecture I give of about the do's and don'ts of RV tanks. I placed it on the wall right next to the toilet paper and it seems to be doing the trick...no tank issues! Great product!
